description: Excel is the number one program employers ask for by name in job descriptions. This extremely powerful program may not feel as intuitive as other Microsoft products to you. As a computer instructor for 14 years I know how to help you jumpstart learning. Join me for a tour of the key features you need to master to become Excel-lent! Each session of this course includes a workbook for you to download and practice right along with me. Save yourself hours of frustration knowing that there must be a better way to accomplish these common tasks in Excel. Check out the course curriculum. I bet there's at least one task that you struggle with. Join me for a fun and painless learning experience.
title: 12 Microsoft Excel Examples Everyone Can Use
